metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29487 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Heimdal Thor agent versions 3.4.2 and before onWindows and 2.6.9 and before on macOS, allows attackers to cause a denialof service (DoS) via the Threat To Process Correlation threat preventionmodule.

criterions.comment: heimdal package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
